description: This file defines functions for creating workflows via API calls, including both synchronous and asynchronous implementations. It imports necessary modules, handles API client authentication, and logs errors if API calls fail.

methods.name: create_workflow
methods.description: Synchronously creates a workflow by sending a POST request to the API with the workflow data.

methods.name: acreate_workflow
methods.description: Asynchronously creates a workflow by sending a POST request to the API with the workflow data.
